comments.body: `ByteBufferOutputStream` is not used anywhere. So what's the purpose of it? Just want to understand if we need to handle `BufferOverflowException` in this class.
comments.diffHunk:

comments.body: Good catch; this was used at one point in some very old code, but it's no longer needed so I'll remove it.
